name: Love Thyself - A Horatio Story
description:
Plunge forehead-first into the exhilarating world of Horatio, the Endless galaxyâ€™s most perfect being. Experience life as a freshly-decanted Horatio clone on his first day of cadet school. 

Will you be the obedient servant of the great forehead in the sky? Will you manage to woo one of four uniquely identical Horatio clones? Or will you skirt the line of disobedience and risk the wrath of the gene-splicer-in-chief?
